raw_comment:
1.	I notice that there are more 15-24 year-olds than 40+ year-olds who believe the world is becoming a better place with each generation.
2.	Where are the data that show the answers of people who think the world is becoming a worse place?
3.	This affects me because I live in a town where the people are mostly in the 40+ age group, and that indicates that I live among less optimistic people.  On the other hand, I teach in a high school, so I am among people on a daily basis, the age group of which believes the world is becoming better with each generation. That is encouraging, that I spend my time among those with positive feelings about the future.
4.	HEADLINE: Positive Youth
